statements: INSERT INTO pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns (campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_audience, email_subject, email_content, open_rate, click_through_rate) VALUES (1, 'Cancer Awareness Campaign', '2023-01-15', '2023-02-15', 'Oncologists', 'Join the fight against cancer', 'Learn more about our mission to combat cancer.', 10.50, 5.25);
